definition[0]: if a government privatizes an organization, industry, or service that it owns or controls, it sells it
definition[1]: if the government privatizes a company or activity that it owns or operates, it sells the company etc to a business or to members of the public, who become its new SHAREHOLDERs
example[0]: the Argentine governmentâ€™s drive to privatize a number of businesses
example[1]: When it privatized agriculture, Vietnam went from rice-importer to exporter in one growing season.
